title: Level Keypad is a weatherproof keypad for Level Lock that lets you access your home via key codes
content:
Today Level Home Inc., the creators of HomeKit-compatible smart home products, is introducing the Level Lock – Touch. Level Keypad provides homeowners and guests with a phone-free way to gain access to a home using handy key codes.

more…

The post Level Keypad is a weatherproof keypad for Level Lock that lets you access your home via key codes appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: The Level Keypad is a new accessory for Level Bolt and Level Lock - Touch smart lock users for gaining entry to your home via key codes.
